font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 装饰，点缀： to make more attractive by adding something that is beautiful or becoming
【例】 flag bedecking the balcony['bælkəni]
【例】bedeck with jewels
【近】 adorn, beautify, decorate, dress, embellish[ɪm'belɪʃ], emblaze[im'bleiz]
【反】 strip 剥去 blemish, deface, mar, spoil 损害，破坏
【记】 be + deck decorate的变体
